availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: McCracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Margaret A. Ogilvie. Father of William H. Ogilvie, Nancy L. Ogilvie, and Samuel B. Ogilvie. Farmer in McCracken County in 1850. Farmer in McCracken County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 2, p. 163A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Paducah, District 2, p. 798.
Find A Grave, "John Winstead Ogilvie Sr. (1825-1900)," Memorial #26863813, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26863813/ (accessed December 10, 2020).
